definition: to bear/to carry/to hold/to continue/to undertake/to take charge/owing to/due to/to receive
surname Cheng/Cheng (c. 2000 BC), third of the legendary Flame Emperors 炎帝[Yan2 di4] descended from Shennong 神農|神农[Shen2 nong2] Farmer God
to receive/to answer (the phone)/to meet or welcome sb/to connect/to catch/to join/to extend/to take one's turn on duty/to take over for sb

sentences.english: Our factory also carries on researches of all types of non-standard thin-walled metal rolling forming machines.
sentences.chinese: 本厂并承接各种非标薄壁金属型材滚压成形机的研制。

sentences.english: The production and marketing to all kinds of chemical fiber fabrics. It also receives various order business.
sentences.chinese: 各种化纤面料的生产销售，承接各类定单业务。

sentences.english: What's more, our factorycan process and repair axletrees.
sentences.chinese: 另外，本厂还承接各种要求的轴芯加工和维修。

sentences.english: The Company to undertake the design and production of various high-level commemorative gift table.
sentences.chinese: 本公司承接设计及生产有纪念性的各种高级礼品表。

sentences.english: He took a job as a carpenter with the task of building a recording studio.
sentences.chinese: 于是他承接了修建一个录音棚的木匠活。

sentences.english: The "YIDE" sensor is a well-known brand in sensor industry in China.
sentences.chinese: 同时我们承接国内外称重传感器的修理及咨询业务。

sentences.english: She took on the mission of exterminating the apostles.
sentences.chinese: 她承接了歼灭使徒的使命。

sentences.english: Our factory continues to give the pattern request production when the customer samples provided.
sentences.chinese: 我厂承接客户提供实样，图样要求生产。

sentences.english: Besides, we also can offer OEM service, or process non-standard bearing housings according to the customers' samples or drawings.
sentences.chinese: 同时，我们还承接各种非标产品的来图来样加工业务。

sentences.english: Our shop accepts advance telephone orders for special Spring Festival goods.
sentences.chinese: 本店承接电话预约办年货业务。

sentences.english: I think we’d have more small projects than big ones.
sentences.chinese: 我想，我们承接的小项目数量将超过大项目。

sentences.english: We would be using a retreat in commodities and commodity-based currencies to buy at lower levels, "PineBridge's King said.
sentences.chinese: 我们会利用商品市场和商品货币下滑之机，逢低承接。

sentences.english: Most eternities symbolise the continuation of the man's love for his wife.
sentences.chinese: 最三不朽象征承接该男子的妻子爱。

sentences.english: To undertake a variety of aluminum products and sample processing.
sentences.chinese: 并且承接各种铝制品来样加工。

sentences.english: The factory also plans to undertake non-standard business.
sentences.chinese: 本厂同时承接来图非标业务。

sentences.english: And ancient gardens to undertake the planning, design and construction business.
sentences.chinese: 并且承接园林古建工程的规划，设计和施工业务。

definition: to join up/to dock/a joint (between components)
to contract for an entire project
to push (for acceptance of a plan)/to push forward/to promote/to actuate/CL:個|个[ge4]
to seek investment or funding/investment promotion
entity/substance/thing that has a material existence (as opposed to a conceptual, virtual or online existence)/the real thing (as opposed to an image or model of it)
